ItemTooltips.stout_shield: One of the items used for your Core Items.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Turn your three Iron Branches into this Magic Wand.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Wanna say, "Screw Phase, I got my Movement Speed items." Well sure, buy this. Perma Movement Speed.
ItemTooltips.vitality_booster: Build this for Heart. Vanguard is terrible for ranged heroes.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: One of the better alternatives to Vanguard(Dont buy if one of your supports is buying mek.)
ItemTooltips.orchid: Although it is not recommended, you can deal tons of damage to the enemy affected by Orchid.
ItemTooltips.cyclone:
Faster + Static Link combo if you know how to use it, but I'll put the steps.

1. Static Link hero.
2. Use Euls on Static Link hero.

Simple.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: You can buy this glorious Aghanim's Scepter not only for ganking, but for pushing towers. :)
ItemTooltips.heart: Tired of Vanguard? Replace it with Heart of Tarrasque!
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Rush BKB. Use to survive in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Razor may be squishy, buy Vanguard to keep Razor in good health.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Use to survive teamfights. You are the main target there, so use this to reflect damage. That way, you are RAZOR SHARP!
ItemTooltips.rapier: DIVINE RAPIER ARE YOU F*CKING KIDDING ME??? IODFNSLKGSNFLKDFSLDSDSDFJODF:DDJSDSNDVS:DS:DFS:DFSMDF. Divine Rapier can f*ck your opponents right up t___*INTERMISSION*___
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Keep hitting enemy. No miss. never.
ItemTooltips.manta: Although It's not recommended, you can disassemble your Sange and Yasha and make Manta. This will provide gankability. Faster.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Can be used for escaping. You can use Eye of the Storm then Shadow Blade. Just... be careful of wards... and dust... and gem...
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: This is Razor's genuine Sandvich. It will give extra movement and attack speed, damage, strength and agility. Faster.
ItemTooltips.satanic: If you are farmed enough, you can OWN at teamfights with Satanic, as it gives you a 175% Lifesteal. If you steal a lot of damage, you can get a really large lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: You can use this for more DMG and more move speed. You may take more damage to yourself, so a Blade Mail is recommended.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: One of the better altenatives for Vanguard, They give you more movement speed.

AbilityTooltips.razor_plasma_field: Used to chase down heroes with low health remaining. Can be used to harass the enemy Early Game.
AbilityTooltips.razor_static_link: This ability can steal damage from enemies, such as the right-clicking Sniper and Drow Ranger. If you are a mid, you can harass the enemy with this ability.
AbilityTooltips.razor_unstable_current: This Passive damages, purges, and slows the enemy if an abiity targets you.
AbilityTooltips.razor_eye_of_the_storm: Use this in teamfights or use it for pushing(if you have Aghanim's Scepter).
